text:
There are some couples in the B-town who don't believe in the concept of PDA while other few are comfortable with paps clicking them. While the concept of 'to each his own' fits in here perfectly, there are a few mysterious couples who manage to keep it all a big secret.
Twitter
When it comes to Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora, the mystery around their alleged relationship finally ended when they started heading out together, whether shying away from the paps. Also, KJo is playing a big role in unveiling the secrecy around their relationship. The way he teases Malaika from time to time and the way she blushes right after has all the answers to your questions.
Twitter
Even though the rumored couple has carefully managed to stay away from the limelight for over a year, they let loose this year and now seem okay with being spotted together.
A report in Filmfare also hinted that wedding too might be on the cards for them. A source was quoted saying,

“Malaika and Arjun are extremely fond of each other. They have never really spoken about each other but they are extremely happy in their own personal space. In a steady relationship now, Malaika and Arjun plan to take their relationship to next level and tie the knot next year."
The couple has managed to get into the spotlight after paps clicked them exiting from a cafe in Bandra. Whether it was a date or not, it's difficult to decode but the way Arjun shielded Malaika from the photographers and the crowd was indeed chivalrous and sweet! Have a look at the pictures.
